New Records: Texas improved to a record 10-0 on the road this postseason
Key Match Events: Marcus Semien’s two-run triple and three-run homer
Corey Seager hit another long home run
Jonah Heim added an eighth-inning shot
Pre-Game Insights: The Rangers’ batters dominated the Diamondbacks’ pitching early
Arizona’s defense cracked at an inopportune time
Post-Match Reflections: Texas moved within one win of their first World Series title
The game marked a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Forty-two of 49 previous teams to take a 3-1 lead have gone on to win the World Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Chase Field with the roof open
There was a festive mood among the fans
Diamondbacks’ defensive errors led to unearned runs
Others: Corey Seager became the first shortstop with three World Series home runs
Lourdes Gurriel Jr hit a sacrifice fly and a three-run homer
Gabriel Moreno delivered a two-run single
